name: ChemBox
description:
ChemBox is a virtual space for simulating chemistry. The base game mode is a sandbox with elements of progression: you start with a pallet of a few chemical compounds and by reacting them together you can discover new compounds (which are added to the pallet).

Down the line I'll be adding more compounds, reactions, and challenges,  as well as educational features, such as bits of information about compounds.

The goal for ChemBox is to provide a more interesting and interactive way to learn basic and advanced chemistry, by letting the players discover it for themselves.

NOTE: Needs Java to run
